IntersectDataHandler.description:
What data transfer type do you want to use for handling the request/response?

Default: MESSAGE
IntersectDataHandler.title: IntersectDataHandler

messageHeaders.description:
Matches the current header definition for INTERSECT messages.

ALL messages should contain this header.

created_at.description: the UTC timestamp of message creation
created_at.title: Created At

sdk_version.description: SemVer string of SDK's version, used to check for compatibility
sdk_version.title: Sdk Version

data_handler.description: Code signifying where data is stored.

has_error.description: If this value is True, the payload will contain the error message (a string)
has_error.title: Has Error
